We're a tiny indie team, consisting of only two dudes and some extra helping hands with things such as the community, you can join our community discord server here : https://discord.gg/ptzMEwYDYW ; to keep up with the latest updates, as well as subscribe to our YouTube here : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFc430ApcNITCzQPM5VvQcQ ; to keep up with the latest trailers!
